title: This 70’s Classic Exposed the Deep State #shorts

media:group.media:title: This 70’s Classic Exposed the Deep State #shorts
media:group.media:description:
It’s likely you’ve never heard of the 1975 political thriller, “Three Days of the Condor”, but that doesn’t mean it shouldn’t be on your watch list. 

In fact, it’s as relevant as ever. 

Three Days of the Condor exposes the horror of the deep state and opens our eyes to the crimes the government is capable of committing, and all too often gets away with.
——————————
CREDITS: 
Written by Jon Miltimore & Sean W. Malone
Narrated by Matt Tabor
Produced and Edited by Michael Ozias
Assistant Edited by Abby Richardson
